text:
The annual dues and expenses of said memberships, and the costs of attendance at meetings of said organizations, shall be allowed and paid only when funds have been specifically appropriated for such purposes; provided, that the Board of Supervisors, by resolution certified by the Controller as to funds available, may authorize such attendance together with allowance and payment of costs thereof; and, provided further that the Mayor or the Mayor's designee may authorize attendance at meetings in California when funds are certified by the Controller as being legally available for such purposes within the publicity and advertising fund. 
(Amended by Ord. 208-64, App. 7/24/64; Ord. 287-96, App. 7/12/96; Ord. 356-98, App. 12/11/98)

heading.catch_text: REPRESENTATION OF CITY AND COUNTY IN CERTAIN ORGANIZATIONS - ANNUAL DUES AND EXPENSES OF MEMBERSHIP; ATTENDING MEETINGS OR CONVENTIONS.
